Adult_Dosing.text:
PE/DVT treatment: 200 units/kg SC q24h, max 18,000 units
VTE prophylaxis: 2500-5000 units subQ daily

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
Safety/efficacy not established
PE/DVT treatment: 129 +/- 43 units/kg subQ daily, adjust dose to goal anti-Xa activity 0.5-1 unit/mL 4-6 hours after injection
VTE prophylaxis: 92 +/- 52 units/kg subQ daily

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: B
Lactation risk
: Infant risk cannot be ruled out
Renal dosing:
Hepatic dosing:

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
Active major bleeding
History of heparin-induced thrombocytopenia
Use for VTE prophylaxis or to treat NSTEMI/UA in patients undergoing neuraxial or epidural anesthesia

Serious.text:
Major bleeding: epidural hematoma, spinal hematoma, intracranial hemorrhage, subdural hemorrhage, hemorrhagic stroke, intrauterine hemorrhage
Thrombocytopenia
Paralysis
